Title: Allows home-schooled children to participate in interscholastic athletic activities and drivers ed in the district where they reside
Summary: Allows home-schooled children to participate in interscholastic athletic activities and driver's education in the district where they reside.
LawCode: Amd ยง806-a, add ยง3202-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the participation of home-schooled pupils in certain school activities
